StyleCategoryDef.label: Tree Dancer
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Tree Dancer style reflects the graceful, acrobatic culture of Grahtwood's canopy cities, featuring flowing lines, leaf motifs, and earth-tone colors that blend seamlessly with the forest canopy.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Wild Hunt
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Wild Hunt style embodies the primal, savage energy of the legendary transformation, with angular designs, claw-like elements, and darker forest tones that evoke the wild nature within.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Green Pact
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Green Pact style represents strict adherence to Y'ffre's covenant, using only animal products and stone, with designs that honor the natural world without harming plant life.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Silvenar
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Silvenar style reflects the diplomatic and mystical nature of the tree-speakers, featuring elegant flowing designs, subtle enchantments, and sophisticated color schemes.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Mane's Guard
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Mane's Guard style blends Bosmer forest aesthetics with Khajiit influences, creating a unique cross-cultural design featuring curved lines and warm colors.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Woodhearth
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Woodhearth style represents the cosmopolitan trading culture, blending traditional Bosmer elements with foreign influences from merchants and travelers.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Haven
StyleCategoryDef.description: The Haven style combines forest traditions with coastal influences, featuring wave-like patterns, blue-green colors, and designs that reflect both sea and forest.
